basics.name: Ankit Mishra
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: A programmer with 7+ years experience developing applications from frontend to backend, working primarily with frontend technologies. I enjoy building interesting products, with emphasis on good engineering principles and clean code.
points: Proficient in creating responsive UI/UX design, aligned with latest standards and accessibility at its core
Expertise in creating/designing scalable & secure RESTful web services from scratch
Strong Object Oriented skills with knowledge of design patterns and data structures
Open source contributions in Chromium, Solidarity & webpack.
Also an active contributor at StackOverflow.com, among top 30% in JS

highlights: Reported and fixed 3 major XSS vulnerability in web application
Building reusable components with Angular, completely config driven
Performed code refactoring to reduce the size by 30% of a core UI component
Building React component library to ensure uniform UX across products
Increased system capacity by 3.5x on the same hardware, by rectifying critical JavaScript memory leaks
Closely working with the UX team, involved in design decision to convert existing application to WYSIWYG interface
Added multi user real-time collaboration using web sockets, with in-built conflict resolution
Added static analysis measures in the build pipeline to prevent known vulnerabilities getting into source code
Created reusable AngularJS components, with responsiveness and accessibility inbuilt
Designed and architectured large scale single page application with i18n support which served ~ 50k req/sec
Mentored multiple colleagues to gain proficiency in NodeJS and Grunt
Improved web app performance by 12% by optimizing critical rendering path and introducing caching layer
Added multi-browser support in a legacy application, also created utility for reducing repetitive efforts
Conducted multiple organization level training on JavaScript, jQuery and Bootstrap
